    binary

    binary.Rmd

    Data review

    library(beastt)
library(distributional)
summary(int_binary_df)
#>      subjid            cov1            cov2             cov3      
#>  Min.   :  1.00   Min.   :51.00   Min.   :0.0000   Min.   :0.000  
#>  1st Qu.: 40.75   1st Qu.:58.75   1st Qu.:0.0000   1st Qu.:0.000  
#>  Median : 80.50   Median :62.00   Median :1.0000   Median :0.000  
#>  Mean   : 80.50   Mean   :62.15   Mean   :0.5813   Mean   :0.475  
#>  3rd Qu.:120.25   3rd Qu.:66.00   3rd Qu.:1.0000   3rd Qu.:1.000  
#>  Max.   :160.00   Max.   :73.00   Max.   :1.0000   Max.   :1.000  
#>       cov4          trt            y        
#>  Min.   :0.0   Min.   :0.0   Min.   :0.000  
#>  1st Qu.:0.0   1st Qu.:0.0   1st Qu.:0.000  
#>  Median :0.0   Median :0.5   Median :1.000  
#>  Mean   :0.3   Mean   :0.5   Mean   :0.625  
#>  3rd Qu.:1.0   3rd Qu.:1.0   3rd Qu.:1.000  
#>  Max.   :1.0   Max.   :1.0   Max.   :1.000
    summary(ex_binary_df)
#>      subjid            cov1            cov2             cov3    
#>  Min.   :  1.00   Min.   :30.00   Min.   :0.0000   Min.   :0.0  
#>  1st Qu.: 38.25   1st Qu.:55.25   1st Qu.:0.0000   1st Qu.:0.0  
#>  Median : 75.50   Median :64.00   Median :0.0000   Median :0.0  
#>  Mean   : 75.50   Mean   :64.69   Mean   :0.2933   Mean   :0.4  
#>  3rd Qu.:112.75   3rd Qu.:73.75   3rd Qu.:1.0000   3rd Qu.:1.0  
#>  Max.   :150.00   Max.   :98.00   Max.   :1.0000   Max.   :1.0  
#>       cov4              y       
#>  Min.   :0.0000   Min.   :0.00  
#>  1st Qu.:0.0000   1st Qu.:0.00  
#>  Median :1.0000   Median :1.00

#>  3rd Qu.:1.0000   3rd Qu.:1.00  
#>  Max.   :1.0000   Max.   :1.00

    Make a propensity score object

    ps_obj <- calc_prop_scr(internal_df = int_binary_df, external_df = ex_binary_df, id_col = subjid,
                        model = ~ cov1 + cov2 + cov3 + cov4)

    Create power prior

    pwr_prior <- calc_power_prior_beta(dist_beta(0.5, 0.5), ps_obj, y)

    Calculate Posterior

    calc_post_beta(ps_obj, y, pwr_prior)
#> <distribution[1]>
#> [1] Beta(191, 135)

    Calculate posterior using a rmp

    mix_prior <- dist_mixture(
  pwr_prior, dist_beta(0.5, 0.5), weights = c(0.5, 0.5)
)
calc_post_beta(ps_obj, y, mix_prior)
#> <distribution[1]>
#> [1] mixture(n=2)
